description: Cloud Virtual Machine (VM) events describe the usage of compute resources. e.g. (AWS EC2/EMR, AWS workspaces, etc.)
caption: Cloud Virtual Machine
name: cloud_vm

1.caption: Launch
1.description: The event pertains to the launch of one or multiple VM's.

2.caption: Terminate
2.description: The event pertains to the termination of one or multiple VM's.

3.caption: Enumerate
3.description: The event pertains to describing or enumerating VM attributes.

count.description: The number of virtual machines associated with the event.
